entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
